analysis.description:

Rialto.transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0xb24754be79281553dc1adc160ddf5cd9b74361a4.sol#122-136) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- msg.sender == owner && block.timestamp < expiration && (balances[msg.sender] - _value) < lockPercentage * supply / 100 (/unique_chucks/2/0xb24754be79281553dc1adc160ddf5cd9b74361a4.sol#126-129)

elements.expression: msg.sender == owner && block.timestamp < expiration && (balances[msg.sender] - _value) < lockPercentage * supply / 100

analysis.description:
Rialto.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0xb24754be79281553dc1adc160ddf5cd9b74361a4.sol#139-153) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _from == owner && block.timestamp < expiration && (balances[_from] - _value) < lockPercentage * supply / 100 (/unique_chucks/2/0xb24754be79281553dc1adc160ddf5cd9b74361a4.sol#144-145)
